mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.order_date, "%Y.%m.%d") orderDate, A.order_id orderId, A.user_id userId, C.nm_kor nmKor, A.payment, A.total_order_price totalOrderPrice, D.nm storeNm, A.pickup_time pickupTime, A.order_status orderStatus, COUNT(*) count from t_order A INNER JOIN t_order_detail B ON A.order_id = B.order_id INNER JOIN t_product C ON B.product_id=C.product_id INNER JOIN t_store D ON A.store_id=D.store_id WHERE A.user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY A.order_id ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(A.order_date, "%Y.%m.%d") DESC, A.order_id DESC

SELECT A.order_detail_id orderDetailId, B.nm_kor nmKor, B.nm_eng nmEng, A.sale_price salePrice, A.quantity, B.pic, B.price, B.product_id productId , COUNT(E.review_id) reviewYn FROM t_order_detail A INNER JOIN t_product B ON A.product_id = B.product_id INNER JOIN t_order C ON A.order_id = C.order_id INNER JOIN t_sale D ON B.product_id = D.product_id left JOIN t_review E ON A.order_detail_id = E.order_detail_id WHERE A.order_id=#{orderId} AND C.user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY A.order_detail_id

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') orderDate, A.payment, A.pickup_time pickupTime, A.order_status orderStatus, A.total_order_price totalOrderPrice, B.nm storeNm FROM t_order A INNER join t_store B ON A.store_id = B.store_id WHERE order_id =#{orderId} AND user_id=#{userId}
